text:
The sessions conducted by Simon was something memorable that value-added to my skill set. The lessons are detailed, informative, inspirational and comical.
Simon was able to introduce me to VBA, what it was used in different industries and what are the possible usage to be applied in my work.

I do recommend Heph Academy if you are looking for tangible skill sets that can be implemented to minimize manual work hours. Thank you Simon!

For someone with no prior knowledge, this course provided an excellent introduction to the various functions of VBA. The instructor (Simon) was also an excellent teacher that explained the concepts in simple terms that could I could easily follow. Overall I had an excellent time learning from Simon.

Simon is a great mentor and is very patient in answering all my queries throughout the course. I have gained useful VBA skills that I could apply to my daily work. It was also nice to hear some insights from Simon about his industry and how the things taught in the course can be used in different scenarios.

Simon and team are amazing teachers. They’ve focused on finance and real world applications which is great and what’s needed. They’ve showed the benefits of VBA and how much time it’ll save. Highly recommended!
Wonderful experience with Simon and the class! Curriculum was well-thought and particularly relevant to what budding professionals would likely encounter. Excited to see what else is in store next.
